(Icedemon, you never posted damage when I had numerous characters of my own 
fire at all your guys.  And I have.  Depth Charge, Angel Prime, etc.  And you 
didn't post for Oblitertron shooting at Angel Prime after Angel Prime 
collided into his chest.  I ain't posting damage for your attacks, until you 
post YOUR damage.  

And, I have no frickin' clue what a "terror force" is, so you're going to 
have to enlighten me.  Now either look through the Egroups message site or 
your e-mail archive thingy, or ask me to send you the e-mail I attacked you 
with)
